NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS - we’ll be in touch soon
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for letting us know you're interested in NCS. We are The Challenge and we run NCS in your area.
We understand you have a question about NCS so we will be in touch soon.
In the meantime, here's a taster of NCS...
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEpX7Q2-CVQ
You may find your answer in our FAQs: http://questions.ncsthechallenge.org/ Or, feel free to get in touch by using the details below.
To kick-start your application, click sign up and login with:
Your NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c} Your young person password: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
Your parent or guardian will need to fill in the main part of your application so please ask them to do this. If you’re not sure who can complete your application form, please check our website.
It’s quicker to apply online but if you would like a paper application form, please contact us using the details below.
Don't worry if you need more information first, we'll be in touch soon.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
E: contact@ncsthechallenge.org T: 0203 542 2400 www.NCSTheChallenge.org
